CONTROLLER.en: Information about the connection to controller
CONTROLLER.fr: Informations sur les connexion à controller

pf_stats_connection.en: average packets number per connection to controller
pf_stats_connection.fr: nombre moyen de paquet par connexion a controller

average_pfstats_latence_DCS.en: Average latency of the DCS net service
average_pfstats_latence_DCS.fr: Latence moyenne du service DCS net

average_pfstats_latence_RVA.en: Average latency of the RVA service

average_pfstats_latence_MOVE.en: Average latency of the MOVE service

average_pfstats_latence_MAEVA.en: Average latency of the MAEVA service

average_pfstats_latence_ARGUS.en: Average latency of the ARGUS service

average_pfstats_latence_DIALOGYS.en: Average latency of the Dialogys service

average_pfstats_latence_R_CAMPUS.en: Average latency of the R_CAMPUS service

sum_pfstats_ccnxcount_1h.en: Number of connections on supervised applications (1h smoothing)
sum_pfstats_ccnxcount_1h.fr: Nombre de connexions sur les applications supervisées (lissage 1h)

sum_pfstats_ccnxcount_1h_DCS.en: Number of connections on DCS net (smoothing 1h)
sum_pfstats_ccnxcount_1h_DCS.fr: Nombre de connexions sur DCS net (lissage 1h)

sum_pfstats_ccnxcount_1h_ARGUS.en: Number of connections on the Argus (smoothing 1h)

sum_pfstats_ccnxcount_1h_DCS_all_ip.en: Total number of connections on DCS net
sum_pfstats_ccnxcount_1h_DCS_all_ip.fr: Nombre total de connexions à DCS

sum_pfstats_ccnxcount_1h_DCS_one_ip.en: Number of connections to DCS by the station at IP 200.8.155.52
sum_pfstats_ccnxcount_1h_DCS_one_ip.fr: Nombre de connexions à DCS par le poste à l'IP 200.8.155.52

pfstats_up_down.en: Bandwidth usage by the DCS service (download/upload)
pfstats_up_down.fr: Consommation de données par le service DCS (download/upload)

pfstats_up_down_one_ip.en: Bandwidth usage by the DCS service (download/upload) by the station at IP 200.8.155.52
pfstats_up_down_one_ip.fr: Consommation de données par le service DCS (download/upload) par le poste à l'IP 200.8.155.52

sum_pfstats_restransmit_1h.en: Number of retransmissions on the supervised applications (smoothing 1h)
sum_pfstats_restransmit_1h.fr: Nombre de retransmissions sur les applications supervisées (lissage 1h)

sum_pfstats_restransmit_1h_DCS.en: Number of retransmissions on DCS net (smoothing 1h)
sum_pfstats_restransmit_1h_DCS.fr: Nombre de retransmissions sur DCS net (lissage 1h)

sum_pfstats_restransmit_1h_ARGUS.en: Number of retransmissions on the Argus (smoothing 1h)
